00019     internal static class Security
00020     {
00021         private static IRoleRepository RolesRepo { get; set; }
00022         private static IRolePermissionRepository RolePermissionsRepo { get; set; }
00023         private static IUserRepository UsersRepo { get; set; }
00024 
00025         static Security()
00026         {
00027             Security.RolesRepo = RepositoryFactory.Get<IRoleRepository>();
00028             Security.RolePermissionsRepo = RepositoryFactory.Get<IRolePermissionRepository>();
00029             Security.UsersRepo = RepositoryFactory.Get<IUserRepository>();
00030         }
00031 
00032         internal static int Authenticate(string email, string password)
00033         {
00034             if (Security.UsersRepo.Users.Any(u => u.email.Equals(email)))
00035             {
00036                 User user = Security.UsersRepo.Users.Single(u => u.email.Equals(email));
00037 
00038                 if (MD5Encode(password).Equals(user.password.Trim()))
00039                 {
00040                     return user.userID;
00041                 }
00042                 else
00043                 {
00044                     return (int)AuthenticationResult.InvalidPassword;
00045                 }
00046             }
00047             else
00048             {
00049                 return (int)AuthenticationResult.UserDoesNotExist;
00050             }
00051         }
00052 
00053         internal static bool IsAuthorized(int userId, PwasObject obj, PwasAction action, PwasScope scope)
00054         {
00055             PwasScope permissionScope = IsAuthorized(userId, obj, action);
00056 
00057             return permissionScope >= scope;
00058         }
00059 
00060         internal static PwasScope IsAuthorized(int userId, PwasObject obj, PwasAction action)
00061         {
00062             RolePermission permission = Security.RolePermissionsRepo.RolePermissions.Single(rp => rp.roleID == Security.UsersRepo.GetById(userId).roleID && rp.@object == obj.StringValue());
00063 
00064             switch (action)
00065             {
00066                 case PwasAction.View:
00067                     return (PwasScope)permission.obj_view;
00068                 case PwasAction.Create:
00069                     return (PwasScope)permission.obj_create;
00070                 case PwasAction.Update:
00071                     return (PwasScope)permission.obj_update;
00072                 case PwasAction.Delete:
00073                     return (PwasScope)permission.obj_delete;
00074                 default:
00075                     return PwasScope.None;
00076             }
00077         }
00078 
00079         internal static string MD5Encode(string input)
00080         {
00081             //Declarations
00082             byte[] originalBytes;
00083             byte[] encodedBytes;
00084             MD5 md5;
00085 
00086             //Instantiate MD5CryptoServiceProvider, get bytes for original password and compute hash (encoded password)
00087             md5 = new MD5CryptoServiceProvider();
00088             originalBytes = ASCIIEncoding.Default.GetBytes(input);
00089             encodedBytes = md5.ComputeHash(originalBytes);
00090 
00091             //Convert encoded bytes back to a 'readable' string
00092             return BitConverter.ToString(encodedBytes);
00093         }
00094     }

00126     internal static class PwasEnumUtilities
00127     {
00128          internal static string StringValue(this PwasObject obj)
00129          {
00130              switch (obj)
00131              {
00132                  case PwasObject.Order:
00133                      return "order";
00134                  case PwasObject.PrintRun:
00135                      return "run";
00136                  case PwasObject.Role:
00137                      return "role";
00138                  case PwasObject.RolePermission:
00139                      return "permission";
00140                  case PwasObject.User:
00141                      return "user";
00142                  default:
00143                      return null;
00144              }
00145          }
00146     }
